item.description:
Rowing and Paddling meet-up for all on Boston's North Shore.  Meet others for kayaking, standup paddling and rowing fun and fitness.  All levels of experience are welcome!

Little Harbor Boathouse is North Shore Boston's source for Hobie Kayaks and SUPs, Echo Rowing Shells & HovieSUP sales and rentals.

Our mission: on-the-water-recreation

We're all about green, clean and healthy human powered water sports and making them accessible to everyone.

• Stand-up Paddle Boarding and Kayaking rentals (hourly and group rentals for up to 30 paddlers).

• Paddle Programs for adults, teens and kids

• Paddle Season Passes for singles, couples & families

• Best Selection of Hobie Kayaks, Hobie Standup Paddle Boards, Echo Open Water Rowing Shell, HovieSUP Standup Paddle Boards, Paddle Accessories, PFDs & gear.

• Hobie Kayak Fishing -- full line of Hobie Mirage Drive Fishing Kayaks & Gear. Home of Hobie Kayak Fishing Team!

Paddle with us from our spectacular Marblehead waterfront location.

littleharborboathouse.com | 781-990-3552 | rowingforall.com

Little Harbor Boathouse Kayak • SUP • Row ... cultivating fun, fitness and well-being for life!
item.name: Community Rowing & Paddling on Boston's North Shore Meetup
